name: Midar
description:
Prototype of a strategy game developed in 1 semester for our Serious Game class.

The goal is to survive through a defined period of time and accomplish events sent to you.

You are able to place buildings and assign villagers to them in order to gather ressources or fight.

Controls :
←  / ↑ / → / ↓ = camera movement

Z / S = camera up and down

A / E = camera yaw rotation

Escape = close game
